title: Messaging Madness Catches Up With Sleepy Joe (Ep 1673)
description:
In this episode I address the real reason behind the COVID messaging madness in the Biden administration. I also address a story about stunning corruption with this government program. 

News Picks:


The fear porn campaign over Omicron is not working. 

The flawed Arizona mask study is an embarrassment to science.

Is the Clinton cabal in legal jeopardy?

Lol! Joe Biden says you’re better off now than you were under Trump.


Amazon is caving to China, again.
